title: Question:
author: alinknila
content: Let's settle this!  Based on your experience which game is more likely to bring a big win - slots, table games or crypto games? On one hand, I know slots bring in large X's, but it is quite rare and you have to be really lucky. On the other hand, I saw people get massive multipliers on crypto games like Crash after a couple of minutes of playing. So which is it?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Which on is crypto game? I see all games to bring winning, the chance in the casino games are proportional to their odd. The higher the chance the lower the odd while the lower the chance the higher the odd. It is left for you which one that you prefer.If it is sport, you have lower odds. Casinos are better I am post is about casinos alone just as it is in your question.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Slots has a high house edge. (chance to lose is higher)Crypto games aka classic games e.g. dice, keno, etc has a low house edge. (chance to lose is lower).However which games you refer to table games? if it's roulette, it's nothing different like slots. But if you talk about poker, blackjack, baccarat etc those are skill based games and it should increase the percentage to win if you're really good with this games.Crash might fall to skill based games too.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: alinknila on September 26, 2023, 02:48:49 PMLet's settle this!  Based on your experience which game is more likely to bring a big win - slots, table games or crypto games? The game more likely to bring you a big win is the game you are more conversant with and know how to play best. It will not do you any good if you keep trying out every game when gambling, choose a niche and become a master of it. With that approach, your chances of winning improves. If you are used to slots, play slots.If you are used to table games in brick and mortar casinos, play them! or look for these games on online casinos where they are featured and play them.

comments.body: Quote from: alinknila on September 26, 2023, 02:48:49 PMLet's settle this!  Based on your experience which game is more likely to bring a big win - slots, table games or crypto games? On one hand, I know slots bring in large X's, but it is quite rare and you have to be really lucky. On the other hand, I saw people get massive multipliers on crypto games like Crash after a couple of minutes of playing. So which is it?I am biased towards slots . Some of my biggest wins have been during a slot game largely because I don't play other table games. The thing with slots is that it is purely a game of luck but table games usually starts out as a game of luck and them with time turns into a game of skill. Therefore your best chances of winning big in table games is dependent on your level of skill.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Probably slots, though I would also mention Crash.Crash can get you pretty high gains, though one has to have a very good control of one's feelings to be able to take the best advantage of such game, there is a slight strategy element on it.Dices, Plinko and other games which allow the gambler to adapt the risk to their needs obviously cannot compare to other games which are all-or-nothing. Perhaps, people in general could have a biased impression on how often and how high slots rewards can be, since slots big wins are usually promoted and shared in social media, special on official Twitter accounts of casinos.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: If by table games, you mean card games and the likes, it's certainly the best option to gain some money. Otherwise, it's best to leave these games alone if you're really looking to make a quick buck. Casino games and crypto games are, by no means, games that do not require skill but only luck. Whereas in table games (card games), you might be able to use your cards into something advantageous at the right moment, and you can play mind games with it too, to make your opponents commit a mistake.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Obviously games with the lowest house edge offer the best chance to win.That mean, definitely not slots. I would also stay away from automated original games as the RTP of these games if most likely lower than what most site claim it to be. Speaking from my own experience these games often show mathematically almost impossible outcomes several times for the house but 0 times for the player.For example I had several times seen the house winning 15 times in a row at blackjack while the "longest win streak" I ever had at BJ stands at 5, hahaha. Needless to say that I lost 6 and more times in a row almost every session.Anyway, low house edge games is the way to go.If you just think of winning big of course then there are only slots. But you need a BIG miracle to do so.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: There are also big multipliers in table games now that some providers started offering different versions of blackjack and roulette, but the tradeoff is playing with a higher house edge.If your meaning of big win is equal to big multipliers, i'd pick crypto games over the rest and maybe try my chance at hitting the jackpot because you won't suffer as much when the house edge starts to take effect. I still remember someone posted a winning bet that had a million multiplier on Stake and it was from a crypto game(probably hi-lo or limbo).

On one hand, I know slots bring in large X's, but it is quite rare and you have to be really lucky. On the other hand, I saw people get massive multipliers on crypto games like Crash after a couple of minutes of playing. So which is it?Based on my experience, it is more likely to bagged big wins in table games compared to slots. For instance, you can develop strategies and tactics when playing a table game, but in slots, you completely rely on your luck and you don't have a control about the outcome of the game.  One of the best example for table games which you can have tactics are blackjacks and poker. So, if you are skilled enough and know the basic strategies on these games, you have a higher probability of winning. Of course it still relies on luck, but your strategies can enhance the odds of your winning. Also, I only play slot games once in a while because wins are quite rare, at least for me.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: You should describe better what do you mean by big win, because big win can be achieved at least in 2 different ways. First is by betting big amount with normal odds such as 2x or 2nd way is by betting small amount to hunt huge multiplier. If we are talking about big bet with low odds, I believe most games are the same except slot because of its high house edge. But if we are talking about small bet for big win, slot games is the best because it gives you many possible payout in every single spin but of course the risk is high.

Because as I said before, the odds will always be in favor of the house.
